body: Francesco, Please excuse both my late reply and my poor coding of the HR component.  It was one of the first that I made and so it was not built with the same flexibility as my newer components.  You can find attached a GH file with an updated HR component that can accept individual values: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*jPEkQu9VMWT1NEu*0wKotIVgeWJ5xXOuJe*0UoQYxt-ThD465Nx*Xm-OMTXaIcbKKuJItlNJzUN2H*J8dvlt5NHvkyLJZfx/FixedHRComponent.JPG) This addresses your first question.  For the second, it sound like you just want to export your data into an excel table.  I recommend using the TTToolbox Excel Exporter: [http://www.food4rhino.com/project/tttoolbox?ufh](http://www.food4rhino.com/project/tttoolbox?ufh) -Chris
